channel.title: The Wildy rsps
channel.description:
The Wildy OSRS | IRON MAN | RUNEPOUCH | DWHAM
Website:
[url=http://thewildy.com]http://thewildy.com[/url]
ABOUT
We run on a high quality dedicated server with 100% uptime. Our staff team is hand picked with players in all different time zones, to provide the best support 24/7.
Player ran community. We listen to YOUR opinion and are constatnly updating and adding new content to keep your experience here fresh and exciting.
Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to be able to not have to spend grueling hours in order to prepare an account to Pk. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We are not a spawn server but have painstakingly though out many aspects of our economy.
Economy
When joining our server you will be asked three game modes to choose from. You can choose from a Hardcore (15xp), Legend (50xp), Hero (500 xp), or Iron man and also Ultimate ironman . Join the community Pk, Boss, or skill and make millions.
Our economy is very stable. We have created numerous methods to allow new items and coins to be generated into the economy. This is normally the downfall of most servers, but we have numerous ways called 'moneysinks' to remove gold and items from the economy creating a stable trend of income/outcome.
Features
RUNE POUCH 100%
DRAGON WARHAMMER
DRAGON CLAWS
CRYSTAL HALLY
AND MUCH MUCH MORE!
100% Cannon
All Skills working
Mammoths
Active Pking
Wilderness Event Monsters
Full Bounty Hunter
Full Screen
50+ active at all times
High Risk clan wars
Corperol Beast[img]https://i.gyazo.com/8342f9bc44efc9bc6050a5ce056056c6.png[/img]
100% Blowpipe
Abyssal Weapons
Highscores
OSRS Wilderness Bosses
OSRS Weapons
100% Dueling(disabled atm)
Amazing combat
Fully working dwarf cannon
Zulrah
100% uptime
Ddos protected
Dupe handler
Lots of mini games
Hunter
Unique home
Torvesta Like armour!
Great staff!!
Much much more!

item.description:
@Wildy_Rsps wrote:

The Wildy OSRS | IRON MAN | RUNEPOUCH | DWHAM

Website:

http://thewildy.com

ABOUT

We run on a high quality dedicated server with 100% uptime. Our staff team is hand picked with players in all different time zones, to provide the best support 24/7.

Player ran community. We listen to YOUR opinion and are constatnly updating and adding new content to keep your experience here fresh and exciting.

Us here at The Wildy want to provide a high quality OSRS experience with a private server twist. We want players to be able
to not have to spend grueling hours in order to prepare an account to Pk. Instead we provide many options to achieve those goals easily. We
are not a spawn server but have painstakingly though out many aspects of our economy.

Economy

When joining our server you will be asked three game modes to choose from. You can choose from a Hardcore (15xp), Legend (50xp), Hero (500 xp), or Iron man and also Ultimate ironman . Join the community Pk, Boss, or skill and make millions.

Our economy is very stable. We have created numerous methods to allow new items and coins to be generated into the economy. This is normally the downfall of most servers, but we have numerous ways called ‘moneysinks’ to remove gold and items from the economy creating a stable trend of income/outcome.
